snippet.title: Avernum: Escape From the Pit Trailer
snippet.description:
Spiderweb Software (http://www.spiderwebsoftware.com) is bringing Avernum: Escape from the Pit, a return to their greatest creation, to Macintosh, Windows, iPad and Android. The first game in a trilogy of epic, indie role-playing games, Avernum tells of a struggle for survival in an enormous prison far below the surface world. As a new prisoner of the pit, you will struggle for survival, look for a way to escape, and even dream of revenge on the surface tyrants who cast you there.

To learn more, go to http://www.avernum.com/avernum/index.html.

The Android version is available at

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.spiderwebsoftware.AvernumHD
